meanings.definition: Of or relating to the cheekbone.
meanings.sent1: Her malars were prominent, giving her face a defined look.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her malars to determine if there was any swelling.
meanings.sent3: The clown painted colorful stripes on his malars, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range cast a shadow on the valley, resembling the curve of malars.
meanings.sent5: The artist sculpted the malars of the statue with great attention to detail.

meanings.sent1: She gently touched her malars, feeling the smooth curve of her cheekbones.
meanings.sent2: His malars were high and defined, giving his face a strong appearance.
meanings.sent3: The cat nuzzled against her malars, seeking affection.
meanings.sent4: The sun cast a warm glow on her malars, highlighting her features.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's opponent landed a punch on his malars, causing him to stumble back.
